lead_paragraph: KINNELL--Galway. The MacDowell Colony wishes to acknowledge the life of poet Galway Kinnell, an extraordinary talent, teacher, and Colony friend. Galway was a great presence during seven residencies from 1959 to 1992. His poem "Oatmeal" stirs memories of cooking his breakfast in a pot on the radiator in his studio at MacDowell. For the many wonderful volumes of poetry and prose, we thank him. His friendship will be remembered fondly by the staff, artists and board. Our deepest condolences to his family and wife, MacDowell board member Bobbie Bristol.
